# TASK::TASK_AGITATED_ACTION_CONFRONT_RESPONSE

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** targetPed
* **PED_INDEX** agitatorPed

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Give agitated action task to the target ped with confront subtask
